original_title: Infinite Potential: The Life & Ideas of David Bohm
overview: INFINITE POTENTIAL takes us on a mystical and scientific journey into the nature of life and reality with David Bohm, the man Einstein called his "spiritual son" and the Dalai Lama his "science guru." A physicist and explorer of Consciousness, Bohm turned to Eastern wisdom to develop groundbreaking insights into the profound interconnectedness of the Universe and our place within it.
tagline: Mystics have known about it for millennia, modern science is catching up.
title: Infinite Potential: The Life & Ideas of David Bohm
